jd: From: swagatika, Bitflow swagatika.senapati@bitflowgroup.com Reply to: swagatika.senapati@bitflowgroup.com Hi,I hope you are doing well.This is Swagatika from BitFlow Innovative Group. I have an excellent Job opportunity for you.Please find the Job Description, please revert me with your updated resume if you are interested. Role: Data EngineerLocation: Orlando, Florida, USA(day 1 onsite) JOB DESCRIPTIONJOB SUMMARY: We are looking for someone who applies practical knowledge of development and engineering to conceive, design, develop, test, and implement data extracts, transformation, migration, and uploads. This will be done using modern software development paradigms (e.g., agile, product, cloud). The right candidate must have experience with food & beverage supply chain technology, with deep skills in SQL development in Windows and RHEL (Red Hat Enterprise Linux) environments. The ideal candidate will also have report/dashboarding development experience using MicroStrategy Cloud Environment. Significant knowledge/experience in relevant technologies, such as:• Experience with food & beverage supply chain technology• Deep skills in SQL development in Windows and RHEL (Red Hat Enterprise Linux) environments• Report/dashboarding development experience using MicroStrategy Cloud Environment• Agile Tools (Jira)
